word:
Will you believe these assurances? Will you say, "Yes, Lord, I take Thee at Thy word. I will begin where I am, to 


                            -612- 

talk (1013) an increase of faith; I will take hold of the promises; they are for me"? O brethren and sisters, what we want is a living, striving, growing faith in the promises of God, which are indeed for you and for me.
